casebody.data:
First Department,

May, 1982

(May 4, 1982) In the Matter of New York City Transit Authority, Petitioner, v Andrew R. Tyler, Respondent.

Proceeding for a writ of mandamus withdrawn, without costs and without disbursements. No opinion. Concur — Murphy, P. J., Carro, Markewich, Silverman and Lynch, JJ.
